No blurring

width, height = 280, 175

distance = 48...
xShift, yShift = 0., 0.

mTarget: 0.32x
mRecovery: 0.32x

for i in range(NofP):
    mRes[i,:] = cp.asarray([0,
			0,
			300*((listX[i]-mPixelX/2-3)**2+(listY[i]-mPixelY/2+5)**2-20)/mPixelX/mPixelY])
bExp = cp.tensordot(matrixA,mRes,axes=([2,4],[0,1]))
